import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { registerMode = false; ngOnInit(): void { console.log(this.registerMode); } registerToggle() { this.registerMode = !this.registerMode; } }
